name: Bounce Buddies
description:
You control the blue ball. Bounce it around to keep the red ball from touching the ground. You can push your ball  against the edge of the screen to charge its bounce and bounce even higher. You're probably going to need to do this since our good friend friction will be slowing your ball down at all times. Press Z to restart.

I made this in a single evening because my friend said that she wanted to play that one game where you have to keep a ball from touching the ground, but she had no one to play it with. So I made my own digital interpretation of it. 

Just to be clear, this is not a good game! There are so many tiny bugs. I did the programming by salvaging bits and pieces from other games I'd made and combining them together in the ugliest way possible. It's mildly enjoyable to play though. Maybe someday I'll sit down and make a version of this that I don't have to be embarrassed by. That day will probably have to wait for a couple of years!
